text: is a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Tatsuta was born in Shizuoka on June 21, 1998. He joined J1 League club Shimizu S-Pulse from their youth team in 2017. He played many matches from 2018. In May 2019, Tatsuta was selected the Japan national team for 2019 Copa Am√©rica.
